title: TeamUp Los Angeles Hockey Night
desc: VIRGIN AMERICA LOS ANGELES ! Los Angeles Kings vs Chicago Blackhawks (NHL) ? Join us for a? Virgin America TeamUP Hockey Night in Los Angeles on Saturday, November 28. ? Let's TeamUP in L.A. and watch two NHL champions battle it out for supremacy in this epic hockey matchup at the Staples Center. ?It's the recent NHL champion  Chicago Blackhawks  taking the ice versus the former champion  L.A. Kings ! ?Plus, immediately after the game, you can also cheer on our official Virgin America Hockey Team as they get to play where the pros play and compete in a scrimmage on the ice at Staples. ? GAMETIME:   7 :30 PM VX HOCKEY TEAM SCRIMMAGE:  ? Immediately following NHL game ? SEATING & PRICING ? Cost Per Ticket (Discounted Group Rate): ?$65.00 All seating will be located in either? Section 331 and 332.? ?A? seat map is available ?for your reference. ** Seating is assigned on a first-come, first-served priority basis. Teammates who purchase tickets sooner will have access to the best available seats. ?All tickets will be put at WILL CALL the night of the game. ** BONUS Included with your ticket is an invitation to attend? The VX Hockey Team Scrimmage , immediately following the NHL game, ? on the ice at Staples Center! Cheer on our official hockey team & show your support! QUESTIONS For questions, please contact  Franco Finn  at franco.finn@virginamerica.com.
